resources.string: %1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
The coefficient of variation in the polynomial
Enter the variable of the system of equations
Feedback app functionality, error during use

Enter the expression in the box, use the phone keypad to enter.

Example:        

sqrt (x) + 2

            2a ^ 2-1

            3m ^ 3 + log2 (x)

 

After entering the expression, press and derivative button.

If you want to maximize the results can use the button in the lower right edge of the screen.

 

LEARN SOME OPERATORS SUPPORT

+ (Plus sign)

Drain

- (minus)

Minus

* (asterisk)

Ring

/ (Slash)

Divide

% (Percent sign)

Percent

^ (Caret)

Exponentiation

! (Exclamation)

Factorial

 

Constants (keyboard input, not case sensitive or often)

Pi

pi

HEY

e

i

Imaginary unit (for complex numbers)

 

SIGHT AND MATHEMATICS CONTENT IS SUPPORTED

Sqrt (x) or √ (x)

Returns the positive square root of x

Abs (x)

Returns the absolute value of a number

sin (x)

Returns the sine of angle x gave

cos (x)

Returns the cosine of the angle x

tan (x)

Returns the tangent of the angle x

asin (x)

Returns the inverse cosine of a number

acos (x)

Returns the arccosine of a number

atan (x)

Returns the tangent of a number

Birth (x)

birth function

cosh (x)

cosh function

C (n, k)

combinations of n elements k convolution

P (n, k)

conformable convolution of n element k

tanh (x)

fishy function

asinh (x)

Birth inverse function

acosh (x)

the inverse of the function cosh

atanh (x)

the inverse of the function fishy

ln (x)

Returns logarithmic-rit nature of some

log (x)

Returns logarithmic-rit nature of some

log2 (x)

Returns logarithmic base 2-rit of some

log10 (x)

Returns logarithmic-rit of a base 10 number.

exp (x)

Returns the power of e with a certain exponent x.

Celi (x)

Rounds a number away from 0

Floor (x)

Get the integer part of a number

Sign (x)

Ham sign

Max (a, b)

Returns the largest value in two numbers a and b

Min (a, b)

Returns the smallest value in two numbers a and b

Rnd (a)

random function

GDC (a, b)

The least common multiple of a and b

Sign (x)

Determination of certain marks. Returns 1 if the number is positive, zero (0) if the number is 0, and -1 if negative.

Enter the expression in the box, use the phone keypad to enter.

Example:        

sqrt (x) + 2

            2a ^ 2-1

            3m ^ 3 + log2 (x)

 

After entering the expression, press the blue button.

If you want to maximize the results can use the button in the lower right edge of the screen.

Drag right to display the Advanced panel.

 

Default computer mode Radian

To calculate sin, cos, tan … in degrees, type sin (30 °), cos (90 °), …

 

To convert fractions to decimals and vice versa, select the button [a / b] in science computer screen.

 

To calculate the complex, concordant, please switch to fractions.

 

Enter the expression and press [Solve] to test

Enter an expression containing variables, and then press [Calc] to define the values ​​of variables.

[Fact] used to analyze the prime factor

"

Enter the equation in the box, using the phone's keypad.

Equation offline x.

Example:         2x ^ 2 + 3x + 1 = 0

            3x-6/2 + 3 + a = 2

            1 / 2x ^ 3 + 1 / x

If you do not enter an equals sign '=', the computer will automatically understand the equation is zero.

After entering the equation, press the test button and wait for the computer to find solutions.

If you want to maximize the results can use the button in the lower right edge of the screen.

 

LEARN SOME OPERATORS SUPPORT

+ (Plus sign)

Drain

- (minus)

Minus

* (asterisk)

"
Enter polynomial needs analysis in this line!
Enter derivative functions needed in this line!
Enter equation need find root in this line!
Enter the expression need expand in this line!
Click here to add more functions
Enter the function to integrate on this line!
Enter the function to primitive on this line!
Enter the expression to simplify in this line!
Do you want to create the matrix, this job will delete the existing matrix?
Enter the variable of the system of equations

"Enter equations forming a system of equations, then enter the equation system hidden For example: press the [more], then enter the following equation 3: x + y + z = 2 x - y + 2z = 6 z + y = 2 Then enter the hidden looking for is x, y, z Press [find experimental]"
"Data entry separated by a comma (,) For example: 12, 232.43, 4"
There is no function to display
No variable for solving equations </br> Please enter variable x</br> Example 2x + 1 or 2x^2 + x - 2
The current version does not support
Find a polynomial of degree n Test
Press this button to analyze the factorization of polynomials, the calculation process can take longer for first-time initialization data
Then press the button to start the calculation, the calculation may take a long time for the first time initialization data
Press this button to derivative function, the calculation process can take longer for first-time initialization data
Click this button to expand the expression, the calculation process can take longer for first-time initialization data
Press this button to integrals, calculation process can take longer for first-time initialization data
Press this button to shortened expression, the calculation process can take longer for first-time initialization data
Press this button to find root the equation, the calculation process can take longer for first-time initialization data
Rate this applications on the Google Play Store
Solve equations with variable (x, y, z, …):
Please enter the correct syntax and contains hidden equation x

"* Primitive =========================== Integrate Analysis prime factors [Fact] n Support analyzed data entry error n LCM greatest common divisor (a, b, …) 2 display modes: Mode fractions - decimals [a / b] n"
Automatically calculates the distance x and y

Commons Math: The Apache Commons Mathematics Library
Always take a banana to a party, Rose: bananas are good!
$$ \\left\\{ \\begin{matrix} a_1x + b_1y = c_1 \\\\ a_2x + b_2y = c_2 \\end{matrix} \\right. $$
$$\\left \\{ \\begin{matrix} a_1x + b_1y + c_1z = d_1 \\\\ a_2x + b_2y + c_2z = d_2 \\\\ a_3x + b_3y + c_3z = d_1 \\end{matrix} \\right. $$

If you use option 4d1, you must provide the Installation Information in the manner specified by section 6 of the GNU GPL for conveying Corresponding Source.)
